en.title: ğŸ”§ Version 1.5.7 (176)
en.text:
1.5.7 (176)

Bug Fixes and Improvements
- Polish added to the app languages list! Thanks to @ciszko on Discord for making this possible!
- More UI improvements: revamped HP bar, panels with adjusted margins, etc.
- Item, background, species and spell search dialog boxes now have improved filters and sorting
- Spells can now have custom Schools of Magic
- Added a method for Features and Items to modify only the Saving Throws score
- Notes are now expandable cards
- Fixed minor bugs
